Reviews.Title: BINGO
Reviews.Author: dan macri
Reviews.Content: I have Canon 280hs with a very well known battery problem, especially in video recording with zoom. I am very happy to post the first VERY GOOD review. (I still wish the company will have a customer service number)1 Zoom test on video: Zoom in/out 20X and record for >15' before stopping. That's better than original Canon.2 Fits perfectly in the camera.3 Could be charged in Canon charger.4 It is cheap and free shipping for standard delivery.5 Cells from Japan.

Reviews.Title: Only 1200mAh, not 1600mAh
Reviews.Author: Ben Hollingsworth "Obi-Wan-YJ"
Reviews.Content: The photo and description of this product are lying.  The batteries I received are only 1200mAh, not 1600mAh.  If I'd wanted the lower rating, I would have saved some money and ordered a different battery that correctly advertised its capacity.  My Canon SX280 camera has horrible battery life as it is, and reducing the battery capacity by 25% only makes matters worse.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery
Battery Specs: 1600 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Canon NB-6L Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1600 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery for Canon PowerShot SX280 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera and Canon NB-6L
